summary: "The Beverly Hillbillies," an American TV sitcom (1962-1971), follows the Clampetts, a poor family from Missouri's Ozark Mountains who move to Beverly Hills after finding oil. In episode 18, "Jed Saves The Drysdales' Marriage," Jed Clampett helps his neighbors, the Drysdales, work through their marital issues. The show, starring Buddy Ebsen and Irene Ryan, was very popular, ranking among the top 20 shows for eight seasons and receiving seven Emmy nominations. It's still shown on TV and inspired a 1993 movie.
title: The Beverly Hillbillies
